question_comments.body: This type of question is where AI tools like ChatGPT/Gemini/Copilot shine i.e. refactoring and improving already built logic and code. I simply pasted your question and code in ChatGPT and got a pretty good and concise refactor. I won't post that code as an answer here as I didn't write it or test it, but use AI as a productivity tool in these situations.

(1) Create a custom TextWatcher class that will handle the onTextChanged logic for all EditText fields. (2) Extract the calculation logic into a separate (reusable) method. (3) Attach the same TextWatcher to all EditText (in your activity, instantiate the custom TextWatcher once and add it to each EditText.)
